articles.title: Kidney Cells Rejuvenation: A Novel Breakthrough - Asiana Times
articles.description: An intriguing discovery which involved rejuvenation of kidney cells was achieved by the scientists at the University of Texas. The study detailing this mechanism was published in Nature Nanotechnology. A previously unknown phenomenon of housekeeping, in which…
